RelatedSentence: I really enjoyed Shawn Reeder 's letter suggesting a revenue - neutral carbon tax .
I really enjoyed Shawn Reeder 's letter suggesting a revenue - neutral carbon tax .
My country of origin , Sweden , enacted a carbon tax early on in 1991 , as well as other measures to combat climate change .
I 've spoken to many Swedes who are very frustrated with the United States for not doing enough to bring down the large per - capita carbon footprint of Americans .
A revenue - neutral carbon tax would help preserve the planet for future generations and would have a minimal or positive impact on the economy .
A revenue - neutral carbon tax would help preserve the planet for future generations and would have a minimal or positive impact on the economy .

A0: an easy free-market-based approach for the United States to gain back some international respect on environmental issues
